Sin.name: Sin
descriptions: Your critical strikes with Shadow spells and abilities increase Shadow damage dealt to the target by 4% until 4 non-periodic damage sources are applied.  Effect lasts a maximum of 12 seconds.
Your critical strikes with Shadow spells and abilities increase Shadow damage dealt to the target by 4% until 4 non-periodic damage sources are applied.  Effect lasts a maximum of 12 seconds.
Your critical strikes with Shadow spells and abilities increase Shadow damage dealt to the target by 4% until 4 non-periodic damage sources are applied.  Effect lasts a maximum of 12 seconds.
Your critical strikes with Shadow spells and abilities increase Shadow damage dealt to the target by 4% until 4 non-periodic damage sources are applied.  Effect lasts a maximum of 12 seconds.
Your critical strikes with Shadow spells and abilities increase Shadow damage dealt to the target by 4% until 4 non-periodic damage sources are applied.  Effect lasts a maximum of 12 seconds.

Cataclysm.name: Cataclysm
descriptions: Reduces the Mana cost of your Destruction spells by 2%.
Reduces the Mana cost of your Destruction spells by 4%.
Reduces the Mana cost of your Destruction spells by 6%.
Reduces the Mana cost of your Destruction spells by 8%.
Reduces the Mana cost of your Destruction spells by 10%.

Bane.name: Bane
descriptions: Reduces the casting time of your Shadow Bolt and Immolate spells by 0.1 sec and your Soul Fire spell by 0.4 sec.
Reduces the casting time of your Shadow Bolt and Immolate spells by 0.2 sec and your Soul Fire spell by 0.8 sec.
Reduces the casting time of your Shadow Bolt and Immolate spells by 0.3 sec and your Soul Fire spell by 1.2 sec.
Reduces the casting time of your Shadow Bolt and Immolate spells by 0.4 sec and your Soul Fire spell by 1.6 sec.
Reduces the casting time of your Shadow Bolt and Immolate spells by 0.5 sec and your Soul Fire spell by 2 sec.

Aftermath.name: Aftermath
descriptions: Gives your non-periodic spells a 4% chance to daze the target for 5 seconds.
Gives your non-periodic spells a 8% chance to daze the target for 5 seconds.
Gives your non-periodic spells a 12% chance to daze the target for 5 seconds.
Gives your non-periodic spells a 16% chance to daze the target for 5 seconds.
Gives your non-periodic spells a 20% chance to daze the target for 5 seconds.

Judgement Day.name: Judgement Day
descriptions: Increases your chance to hit with non-periodic Fire spells by 3%.
Increases your chance to hit with non-periodic Fire spells by 6%.

Heart of Darkness.name: Heart of Darkness
descriptions: Increases your chance to hit with non-periodic Shadow spells by 3%.
Increases your chance to hit with non-periodic Shadow spells by 6%.

Devastation.name: Devastation
descriptions: Increases the critical strike chance of your Shadow and Fire spells by 1%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Shadow and Fire spells by 2%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Shadow and Fire spells by 3%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Shadow and Fire spells by 4%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Shadow and Fire spells by 5%.

Shadowburn.name: Shadowburn
descriptions: Instantly blasts the target for 99 Shadow damage.  If the target dies within 5 seconds of Shadowburn, the caster gains 3 Soul Shards.

Intensity.name: Intensity
descriptions: Gives you a 35% chance to resist interruption caused by damage while casting any Fire spell.
Gives you a 70% chance to resist interruption caused by damage while casting any Fire spell.

Destructive Reach.name: Destructive Reach
descriptions: Increases the range of your Destruction spells by 10%.
Increases the range of your Destruction spells by 20%.

Tormentor.name: Tormentor
descriptions: Increases the critical strike chance of your Searing Pain spell by 2%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Searing Pain spell by 4%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Searing Pain spell by 6%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Searing Pain spell by 8%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Searing Pain spell by 10%.

Pyroclasm.name: Pyroclasm
descriptions: Your Soul Fire spell causes the ground beneath the target to ignite for 30 seconds, causing damage equal to half your Fire spell damage every second.

Seared to the Bone.name: Seared to the Bone
descriptions: Increases the initial damage of your Immolate spell by 10%.
Increases the initial damage of your Immolate spell by 20%.
Increases the initial damage of your Immolate spell by 30%.
Increases the initial damage of your Immolate spell by 40%.

Ruin.name: Ruin
descriptions: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Destruction spells by 100%.

Emberstorm.name: Emberstorm
descriptions: Increases the damage done by your Fire spells by 2%.
Increases the damage done by your Fire spells by 4%.
Increases the damage done by your Fire spells by 6%.
Increases the damage done by your Fire spells by 8%.
Increases the damage done by your Fire spells by 10%.

Conflagrate.name: Conflagrate
descriptions: Ignites a target that is already afflicted by Immolate, dealing 306 Fire damage and consuming the Immolate spell.
